duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage handscoring contracts, scheduling, resource planning, and item-specific training.
Oversee scoring team, post-project work, and data analysis.
Apply science expertise in item development, meetings, and content development.
Communicate with various roles via chat, email, phone, and in-person interactions.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in their roles and expertise.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science or Physical Sciences (Master's preferred)
